column4: Hey guys, sorry to bother you, I just installed the latest ubuntu distrib on a usb drive.  Console works fine, but gdm does nothing after login.  Shutting down gdm and running "startx" gives a working gnome.  Any ideas ?
take a look at /var/log/gdm , might be a clue there
ok, thanks, I'll have a look and come back.
not promising I'll have the answer to a failure there by the way :)
